# See https://llmstxt.org/ for more information.

User-agent: *

# Disallow crawling of pages with user-generated content and personal data.
Disallow: /guestbook
Disallow: /sponsor
Disallow: /places

# Disallow crawling of all API endpoints.
Disallow: /api/

# Allow crawling of all other public-facing content like the homepage,
# projects, blog, experience, resume, and legal pages.
Allow: /
